snippet: We found that the abuses that bedeviled the foreclosure process are appearing in lawsuits to collect credit card debt. Meanwhile, no criminal case is likely in the $1 billion loss at Jon S. Corzine's MF Global.
abstract: We found that the abuses that bedeviled the foreclosure process are appearing in lawsuits to collect credit card debt. Meanwhile, no criminal case is likely in the $1 billion loss at Jon S. Corzine's MF Global.

headline.main: Week in Review: Credit Cards and Corzine
